tutorial.title:
Loan Payments
(Monthly Compounding)
tutorial.scenario:
If you finance the purchase of a new desk and chair for $525 at 15% APR compounded monthly for two years, how much is the monthly payment?

Play
tutorial.step: Press the RESET button to clear all the previous entries.
Enter the number of periods (in this case 24, since the purchase is financed for two years), and then press the N button.
Enter the periodic interest rate (in this case 15/12, since the APR is compounded monthly), and then press the = button followed by the I/Y button.
Enter the loan amount (in this case 525), and then press the PV button.
Press the CPT button and then the PMT button to solve for the monthly loan payment.
